original_text: Jesus also said, ‘I can tell you again what the kingdom of heaven is like. Some men had nets to catch fish in. They threw their nets into the lake and they caught many different kinds of fish.
korean_text: 또 천국은 마치 바다에 치고 각종 물고기를 모는 그물과 같으니

sentences.korean_translation: 내가 다시 너희에게 말해줄 수 있다

sentences.original_text: what the kingdom of heaven is like
They threw their nets into the lake
and they caught many different kinds of fish
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 여러 종류의 많은 물고기를 잡았다
